name: financial_cash_statement
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool macrotrends_finance.
Tool description: Stocks API helps to query for the Financials Statement/Sheet that has over 10 years of finacial data.
API description: Gives 10 years data of cash statement by the given ticker symbol.

To choose for a time format put a QUERY PARAMETER (freq) either "A" for annual or "Q" for quarterly

(symbol) To choose what ticker symbol to see the company financials.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol to retrieve financial statements for.

formstyle.description: The format in which to return the data. Default is 'dataframe'.

freq.description: The frequency of the data. Use 'A' for annual or 'Q' for quarterly. Default is 'Q'.
